name: node-file-rev
description: Simple node cli tool to revision files and write them to a rev-manifest.json

scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run prepare
scripts.prepare: echo 'hello{ color: blue; }' >> tests/assets/another.file.css && echo 'hello{ color: red; }' >> tests/assets/test.css && echo 'div{ border: 1px solid red; }' >> tests/assets/other.file.css

author: Lukas Oppermann
